source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select count(1) from activityLogs with (NoLock)
    WHERE  Cast(datetime as date) <= Cast(getdate()-47 as date)

SELECT count(1)
FROM sys.dm_db_index_physical_stats (DB_ID(), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL) AS DDIPS
INNER JOIN sys.tables T on T.object_id = DDIPS.object_id
INNER JOIN sys.schemas S on T.schema_id = S.schema_id
INNER JOIN sys.indexes I ON I.object_id = DDIPS.object_id
AND DDIPS.index_id = I.index_id
WHERE DDIPS.database_id = DB_ID()
and I.name is not null
and T.name NOT LIKE '%staging%' and T.name NOT LIKE '%archi%' and T.name NOT LIKE '%exceptio%' 
and t.name not in( 'CheckfreeApiSerilog','NextlyThirdPartyLog','ACISeriLogs2','VerafinSeriLogs', 'PayrailzApiSerilog','SccuBeta_ErrorLog')
--and t.name = 'LoginHistory'
AND DDIPS.avg_fragmentation_in_percent > 30
AND DDIPS.page_count>50000

properties.description: Pipeline email notification on job completion
This pipeline has activities which archive/purge data from souce DB's to Archive DB

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT DISTINCT DestinationSchemaName FROM MasterConfig WHERE IsArchiveEnabled=1 OR IsPurgeEnabled=1

text.value:
DELETE FROM activityLogs with (RowLock)
    WHERE  Cast(datetime as date) <= Cast(getdate()-47 as date)

UPDATE ExternalAlertImportLog
SET LastProcessedDateTime = '@{variables('EndingTime')}'

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM MasterConfig WHERE DestinationSchemaName='BusinessData' AND SourceTableName='ActivityLogs' AND ArchiveDays > 0
SELECT * FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName} with (NOLOCK) WHERE CAST(@{item().KeyColumn} AS DATE) < DATEADD(DAY, -@{item().ArchiveDays}, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
SELECT * FROM MasterConfig WHERE DestinationSchemaName='BusinessData' AND AND SourceTableName='ActivityLogs' AND PurgeDays > 0

text.value: DELETE  FROM @{item().DestinationSchemaName}.@{item().DestinationTableName} WHERE CAST(@{item().KeyColumn} AS DATE) < DATEADD(DAY, -@{item().PurgeDays}, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))

DELETE	FROM RefreshTokens with (ROWLOCK)
	WHERE ExpiresUtc < GETUTCDATE()

DELETE FROM [dbo].[NF_UserConnections] with (ROWLOCK)
	WHERE CreatedDate <= DATEADD(DAY, -2, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
 
DELETE	FROM TempUserLoginValidations with (ROWLOCK)
		WHERE [IsDeleted]=1
